General.Name: Plutocoin
General.Description: Pluto Coin aims to be currency for the Diamond Industry for all the overseas transactions. All site holders, manufacturers, traders and end customer bear the costs of currency transactions. Currently, a high amount of the industry is lost in banking charges and forex charges, Plutocoin hopes to reduce transaction times and fees. The Plutocoin asset (PTC) is a mineable Scrypt PoS/PoW coin.

ICO.Description:
Pluto Coin wishes to be currency for the Diamond Industry for all the overseas transactions. All site holders, manufacturers, traders and end customer bear the costs of currency transactions. Currently a high amount of the industry is lost in banking charges and forex charges, Plutocoin hopes to reduce transaction times and fees.

The Plutocoin asset (PTC) is a mineable Scrypt PoS/PoW coin.

 

Team:

  • Dmitriy baday: Chief Managing Director. 
  • Miko Hogeg: Co-Founder. 
  • Ivan Denver: CFO,Co-Founder. 

 

Plutocoin will be holding its ICO on March 1st, 2018. The ICO token supply represents XX% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 1,500,000,000 tokens available, for 0.21$ USD each during the offering. The ICO funding target is 50 BTC, the funding cap is 215 BTC and is expected to end on May 29th, 2018 or when the funding cap is reached. Any unsold/remaining tokens will burned.

The Plutocoin ICO will feature a bounty, and the token will be mineable.
